global_caption: a scene featuring a man wearing a white shirt, wearing sunglasses, holding a map, wearing black shoes, brown pants, and a silver watch on his left wrist, with his hands in his pockets; a man wearing a green t-shirt, brown shorts, and black shoes, with a silver watch on his left wrist and his hands in his pockets; a woman with long brown hair wearing a shirt with flower patterns on it, wearing short blue pants, holding a cup of coffee in her left hand, dragging a silver trunk in her right hand, wearing slippers and a little fat; a short, average-height woman with black hair wearing a light blue one-piece dress and sandals, looking up while holding a black camera in her right hand, positioned up to her face, and dragging a beige straw hat in her left hand; a wide-brimmed hat with a black ribbon; and a shiny silver suitcase with vertical grooves and a retractable handle.
